title: How to Make Pyrethrum Garden Spray

steps.headline: Mix the flower heads with the hot water.
steps.description: Allow to stand for one hour.

steps.headline: Add the soap powder and mix.
Pour the mixture into a spray bottle.

text: Obtain the flower heads.  Mix the flower heads with the hot water. Allow to stand for one hour. Strain off the flower heads.  Add the soap powder and mix.  Pour the mixture into a spray bottle.  Spray.
sentences: Mix the flower heads with the hot water.
Allow to stand for one hour.
Add the soap powder and mix.
Pour the mixture into a spray bottle.
